title: Sexual assault reports draw scrutiny to France's after-school sector
byline: By Lorraine de Foucher  and Eléa Pommiers
subhed: For several months, reports of sexual assaults on children outside regular school hours have multiplied in Paris and across France. This phenomenon remains difficult to quantify and define, affecting a sector that is poorly regulated and lacks clear boundaries.

title: Two months after Louvre heist, French museums remain on high alert
